name: MapUserTrackingMode
desc: The modes available for user tracking.

items.name: case follow
items.desc: The map updates by following a user’s location.

items.name: case none
items.desc: The map doesn’t update based on the user’s location.

items.name: static func == (MapUserTrackingMode, MapUserTrackingMode) -> Bool
items.desc: Determines whether two tracking modes are equal.

items.name: static func != (MapUserTrackingMode, MapUserTrackingMode) -> Bool
items.desc: Determines whether two tracking modes aren’t equal.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: An integer that represents the hashed value of the tracking mode.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the tracking mode by feeding them into the given hash function.
